page.title: 05LEISURE TIME
page.content: Most of the children attend clubs. All the fourth year girls go to the riding school. The fourth year boy goes to football club and the squash club. One of the third year girls goes to guides and one goes to the squash club and the other goes to riding school. One second year goes to Gym club another one goes to cubs. The second year girl goes to sunday school with one of the first year girls. The rest dont go to clubs. children living on the main road dont play out much. Those living near the green play out a lot. The boys ride their bikes and the girls play at dressing up and play with their dolls. The older girls go riding or help at the stables.
